Sunn O)))

              —

description:
Greg Anderson & Stephen O’Malley’s Sunn 0))) mark 20 years of shaking our foundations with ‘Life Metal’, their 8th studio album and first all analog recording, engineered by none other than Steve Albini.

Under a title that pricks trve metal seriousness (it’s an inside joke about Norwegian metal “sellouts”), ‘Life Metal’ is offered as the closest possible... more

description:
Thee almighty Sunn 0))) vent elemental in ‘Pyroclasts’; a powerful spirit twin to their force of nature ‘Life Metal’, also recorded by Steve Albini at Electrical Audio, Chicago.

label: Constellation
description:
Montreal’s pivotal motorik/gallic rock unit rouse from 15 year hiatus with a wonderful charge of spiralling, noisily electronic swells in their 4th album for Constellation.
